thread.title: BRIEF-JPMorgan Expects FY18 Firmwide Net Interest Income To Be $54 Bln - $55 Bln

title: BRIEF-JPMorgan Expects FY18 Firmwide Net Interest Income To Be $54 Bln - $55 Bln
text:
21 AM / in 3 minutes BRIEF-JPMorgan Expects FY18 Firmwide Net Interest Income To Be $54 Bln - $55 Bln   
April 13 (Reuters) - JPMorgan Chase & Co: 
* JPMORGAN CHASE & CO - EXPECT FIRMWIDE FY2018 ADJUSTED EXPENSE OF ABOUT $63B, INCLUDING THE $1.2B IMPACT OF THE REVENUE RECOGNITION ACCOUNTING STANDARD 
* JPMORGAN CHASE & CO - EXPECTS FY2018 FIRMWIDE NET INTEREST INCOME TO BE $54 BLN - $55 BLN 
* JPMORGAN CHASE & CO - EXPECTS FY2018 FIRMWIDE AVERAGE CORE LOAN GROWTH OF 6-7%, EXCLUDING CIB LOANS 
* JPMORGAN CHASE & CO - EXPECT FIRMWIDE FY2018 NONINTEREST REVENUE GROWTH OF ABOUT 7% , MARKET DEPENDENT 
* JPMORGAN CHASE & CO - EXPECT FY2018 FIRMWIDE EFFECTIVE INCOME TAX RATE TO BE ABOUT 20% Source text: [ bit.ly/2GTNU9P ] Further company coverage:
